summary: Represents a logical grouping of features that are sourced exclusively from a batch data source, encapsulating metadata such as name, associated entities, time‑to‑live, schema definition, online availability flag, descriptive text, tags, and ownership information.
business_intent: Allows data engineers and ML practitioners to define, version, and manage batch‑only feature collections within a feature store, supporting offline feature extraction for model training and optional online serving while controlling data freshness through TTL settings.
